summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4282 for the improvement of 40th Avenue Southwest, from Gatewood Road to West Othello Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 50877, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
